query-expansion.qe-prompt1:
Please, I need your help to rewrite this original query for a search engine: '{original_query}'.

The query that I want you to generate must be similar to the original one, and must contain only information valid for most of the given phrases:
{phrases}

Please answer with the generated query for the search engine and nothing more. Do not write any delimiter, write only the generated query.
The generated query must be short.
 The generated query must be an expansion of the original query, and must be made of one single phrase
query-expansion.qe-prompt3:
Please summarize all these sentences in one single short phrase that must be valid for each of them:
{phrases}

The phrase that you have to generate must be an expansion of this original sentence: '{original_query}'.

Please answer with the generated phrase only, without any additional information.
query-expansion.qe-few-shot-1:
Initial Query: cat drinking
Captions:
	• A small tabby cat is on top of a toilet
	• A cat batting at the water in a toilet
	• A small kitten sits on the rim of a toilet seat
	• A cat stands on a toilet seat and peers into the bowl
	• A cat that is sitting on a toilet seat
Expanded query:
cat drinking from the toilet


Initial query: horse sleeping
Captions:
	• Several horses standing and lying down in a grassy field.
	• A horse and a donkey stand in a fenced field.
	• Two horses graze in a grassy pasture lined with pine trees.
	• A brown horse standing in a field next to a fence and a house.
	• The horses are grazing in the meadow in springtime.
Expanded query:
horse grazing in natural environment

Initial query: a sport race
Captions:
	• The large group of people are riding bikes down the street.
	• two men in helmets skateboarding down a street
	• a group of people riding bikes down the road
	• Three people on skateboards wearing racing suits and helmets.
	• A street with a group of bicycle riders behind one rider in the front of the pack.
Expanded query:
a sport race of people riding

Initial query: tennis player
Captions:
	• A female tennis player on a tennis court.
	• a girl holds a tennis racket on a tennis court
	• A woman on a court with a tennis racket.
	• A woman standing on a tennis court holding a racquet.
	• There is a woman swinging a tennis racket.
Expanded query:
woman tennis player on court

Attention, now it is your turn! Answer with the expanded query only!

Initial query: {original_query}
Captions:
{phrases}
Expanded query:

group-captioning.cap-prompt1: write one single short phrase that contains only information valid for all the given phrases:
group-captioning.cap-prompt2:
You are a helpful computer vision assistant tasked with labeling clusters of images.
Below, you will find some images captions that have all been clustered together by an unsupervised clustering algorithm.
 Your task is to provide a one to two word label describing this cluster of images starting from the given captions. Just provide the label — your best guess — and we'll take care of the rest. Do not explain your reasoning or provide any additional context.
group-captioning.cap-prompt3prova: Please summarize all these sentences in one single short phrase: {phrases}
